Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will meet your specific needs. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at an exclusive price of $15000. This investment is expected to pay off in terms of long-term benefits and competitive advantage in your market. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
